title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.13 - Pesticides
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 128-3.13 - Pesticides

State Regulations

Unless otherwise permitted by these rules and regulations, the discharge or use, or storage of pesticides which is reasonably likely to lead to a discharge, of pesticides into the environment (including into groundwater), and which is reasonably likely to cause degradation of surface water quality or of the water supply, is prohibited. It shall be an affirmative defense under this subsection that such discharge, or storage likely to lead to a discharge, is either permitted or not prohibited under Federal law, and is either permitted or not prohibited under State law. Notes

128-3.13

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
